title: Emigre Magazine Worth
content:
I just picked up a ton of second-hand Emigre magazine issues today. I know I've seen some for crazy prices on eBay, but I'm wondering if there's any monetary worth to issues that are not in mint condition.

Anybody looking for specific issues? There's a few I wouldn't want to part with, but there's a good deal I would sell.
author: FeeltheKern

comments.content: I believe that the early, [sold-out issues](http://web.archive.org/web/20131017155146/http:/www.emigre.com/EMagView.php) command the highest prices (although I could be wrong).
And to think I threw a whole lot of them in the bin during spring cleaning some 10 years ago :-(

Which issues do you have available?  
I'd like to have all for documentary purposes, and I'm still missing many amongst the first ten issues, and a few between issue 10 and 20.  
I would especially like to have issue 6.
